alert.note: Alert for Day; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Roberts, northeastern Day and southeastern Marshall Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 219 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Long Hollow Housing to Agency Village. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Agency Village around 225 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Buffalo Lakes, Finley Heights Housing, Rudebusch Corner, Piyas Lake, Campbell Slough, Enemy Swim Lake and Pickerel Lake Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
